title: Is it necessary to solve rd Sharma along with NCERT main and NCERT examplers for basic maths board exam class 10? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: NCERT is a must, so do it thoroughly. As much as u can. Because board question patterns are direct from ncert. Then for more practice and variation u can refer to RD. Examples. After that, Exemplar is a bit on the tricky side. But if u r a scorer of u like maths, then its interesting and can easily get u 95-100. But it aint necessary. Thorough NCERT, and a bit of RD, u can bag a fine score.
